amendment.description: To provide for payments under subsections (a) through (e) of section 2604 of the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 3900 withdrawn in Senate.

Amendment SA 3900 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S59-60; text: CR S59) To provide for payments under subsections (a) through (e) of section 2604 of the Low-Income Home Energy Assistance Act of 1981.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3900 proposed by Senator Sanders to Amendment SA 3899.
